Sequence Information.Peptide Name: WW305 (Synthetic AMPs, Trp-rich, Arg-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, Arg-scan, computer designed

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (87.5%) toWW299. W=R: 38%.Activity: active against S. aureus USA300 LAC (MIC 12.5 uM), P. aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC 12.5 uM), and K-pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC >25 uM).Toxicity: human RBC: not hemo.lytic (HC50 >200 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Wu Q, Chhonker YS, Zhang Y, Zarena D, Salnikov ES, Dang X, Wang F, Murphy C, Foster KW, Gorantla S, Bechinger B, Murry DJ, Wang G.2020
Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020 Aug 11;117(32):19446-19454. doi: 10.1073/pnas.2005540117.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Two distinct amphipathic peptide antibiotics with systemic efficacy.
